entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @POTUS No more social distancing, fully open the economy, even don't botter to make Vaccine. The drug for Covid19 prevention or even cure is Hydroxychloroquine, President Trump takes it so it should be good! No more nightmare, bye bye Covid19.
